30
31 /*!
32 * \brief <+description of block+>
33 * \ingroup lora_sdr
34 *
35 */
36 class LORA_SDR_API header : virtual public gr::block
37 {
38 public:
39 typedef std::shared_ptr<header> sptr;
40
41 virtual void set_cr(uint8_t cr)=0;
42 virtual uint8_t get_cr()=0;
43
44 /*!
45 * \brief Return a shared_ptr to a new instance of lora_sdr::header.
46 *
47 * To avoid accidental use of raw pointers, lora_sdr::header's
48 * constructor is in a private implementation
49 * class. lora_sdr::header::make is the public interface for
50 * creating new instances.
51 */
52 static sptr make(bool impl_head, bool has_crc, uint8_t cr);
53 };
54
55 } // namespace lora_sdr
56} // namespace gr

58#endif /* INCLUDED_LORA_SDR_HEADER_H */
